value:
Hmpf...Heroes...from other worlds...
I bet there's at least one of them
who's not totally loyal to you.$k$pYou give the word, and then I'll
get rid of whomever it is.
Permanently.

Reese is not my sister. Maybe she
and I made some pledge when
we were children.$k$pBut that was then, and this is
now. Who'd hold to silly promises
like that anyway?

Hey, you. You're going to way too
much trouble for everyone's sakes.
Take a break, will you?$k$pIf you don't, I might just have to
give you a permanent nap
with my bow here.

Sure I follow your orders, but don't
get the wrong idea. I'm...I'm just
bound by a contract, all right?

Hey, if I fail miserably in battle and
you don't want to keep me
around anymore...$k$pOh, forget it. Do what you need to.

Don't worry. I'm not going to put an
arrow in you. Just delivering a hello
from $Nf.

Wow! But then again, I'd
expect nothing less.

Huh. Good enough to prove
you shouldn't throw me out.

No, anything but this! Don't
look at me.

Hmpf. Well, I won't be totally
ungrateful about this.

I'm Clarisse. I'm a cut above all the
other rubbish you probably see
around here.

I've been thinking about something.
Lots of time has gone by since
I got here.$k$pI've maybe helped you more
than I like...but also sneered at
you more than I should.$k$pStill, the longer I'm here in the
castle, I wonder if this is what
having a family feels like.$k$pHey! Get that smile off your face.
I'm only wondering! Not saying
it's what I want!$k$pSeriously, never bring this up again.
Or else I'll have to—you know,
put an arrow in your hide.$k$pAll right then, have we reached
an understanding? Good.
はっ！
ふんっ！
きゃああっ！
I'll kill you for that...
You filth!
I'll put you out of your misery.
You're mine.
Now, die.
I'll get you...
huhu
What? Need my help or something?
Ah! Good way to wind up in a grave.
Don't pretend like we're friends.
Why are you nice to me?!
This kindness is getting old.
Alone...as always...
I guess I'll listen to what you've got to say.
Fine.
Sure.
OK.
